sentences.en: He managed to evade capture because of the breakdown of a police computer.
sentences.cn: 因为警方一台电脑瘫痪，他成功地躲避了抓捕。

sentences.en: He tried once again to evade the peace terms.
sentences.cn: 他再一次努力回避和约条款.

sentences.en: He tried to evade the embarrassing question.
sentences.cn: 他企图回避这令人难堪的问题.

sentences.en: I always found something or other to say to evade the thing.
sentences.cn: 我老是找各种的话来作借口,想躲避这件事.

sentences.en: I could tell that he was trying to evade the issue.
sentences.cn: 我看得出他在极力回避这个问题。

sentences.en: If you try to evade paying your taxes you risk going to prison.
sentences.cn: 如果你试图逃税,你就有坐牢的危险了.

sentences.en: It is appalling that so many people evade paying taxes.
sentences.cn: 那么多人逃税,真是惊人.

sentences.en: It is useless your trying to evade the question.
sentences.cn: 你用不着环顾左右而言他.

sentences.en: It's terrible the way the men who are in authority seek to evade their responsibility.
sentences.cn: 有权的人总想逃避责任,这种情况真可怕.

sentences.en: Nonetheless, this creates incentives for designing deals to evade regulation.
sentences.cn: 然而, 这造成了为逃避监管而设计交易的动机.

sentences.en: One cannot evade responsibility for guilt.
The shooting happened while the man was trying to evade capture by the security forces.
sentences.cn: 那个男子试图逃脱安全部队的抓捕时,有人开了枪.

sentences.en: Their schemes to evade taxes were very crafty.
sentences.cn: 他们逃税的计谋非常狡猾.

sentences.en: They left their villages to evade being press-ganged into the army.
sentences.cn: 为了不被抓去当兵，他们逃离了自己的村庄。

sentences.en: You are in charge of the job . How could you evade the issue?
sentences.cn: 你是负责人, 你怎么能对这个问题不置可否?

sentences.en: You can’t go on evading your responsibilities in this way.
sentences.cn: 你不能这样继续逃避责任。

sentences.en: You’re simply trying to evade the problem.
sentences.cn: 你根本是在设法逃避问题。

trans.tran_cn: 逃避，回避，躲避，想不出，与…无缘
trans.tran_en: to not do or deal with something that you should do

trans.tran_cn: 逃避， 躲避， 躲开；回避
trans.tran_en: to avoid talking about something, especially because you are trying to hide something
